testimonials.author: Kate Dowling
text: Working with Liz and Luke on the redesign of my website was such a great experience! When Liz sent me the prototype for my website, I fell in love with the design immediately!
She has captured my new brand essence perfectly. Liz and Luke went above and beyond my expectations in getting everything working perfectly.

testimonials.author: Jade Foster-Jerret
text: Thank you so so much to Liz for my amazing website!
It's really refreshing to have a web designer that listens to my needs, understood my situation and created a website that I'm actually in love with and proud to show off!
I highly recommend and will definitely be coming back to you for future website development for my other businesses too!
